page.title: 18Population
page.content: The area is sparseley populated, about 200 people reside within its boundaries.Over 75% of the population live in the village of Kynnersely,the remainder live either in the hamlet of Crudgington Green or in scattered isolated settlements.Though only about 10% of the population were born in the village of Kynnersley a further 20% were born within a five mile radius of the village.The majority of the population of the village are therefore incomers.Once resident in the area few people move away unless they have to.Most people said they liked the area.The oldest resident of this area is in her nineties,she moved into the area over sixty years ago.The Preston Trust Homes support a population of 25 pensioners,mostly female.Less than 25% of the population are under the age of 16
